summary: Completed frontend testing of Blueview2 construction management app with monochromatic tech aesthetic transformation. Successfully tested login, dashboard, projects page, and floating navigation functionality.

ui_bugs.issue: User session not persisting properly - frequent redirects to login page during navigation

passed_tests: Login page renders correctly with monochromatic styling and glassmorphism effects
Login functionality works with correct credentials (admin@blueview.com / BlueviewAdmin123)
Dashboard displays correct stats (24 workers, 5 projects, 18 on-site)
Dashboard shows proper monochromatic design with dark backgrounds and white/gray text
Floating navigation bar displays correctly at bottom of screen
Projects page loads and displays project list with proper styling
Projects page shows 3 sites with correct project information
Navigation between Dashboard and Projects works via floating nav
BLUEVIEW branding and 'Site Operations Hub' tagline display correctly
Demo credentials are shown on login page
Glassmorphism effects and subtle animations work properly
Clean minimal design matches high-end tech management app aesthetic
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix session persistence issue - user authentication state is not being maintained properly during navigation, causing frequent redirects to login page. This prevents full testing of Workers, Daily Log, and Reports pages.
